mapper.select: SELECT SEQ,ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, POST, ADDRESS, AUTH, DEL, MYIMG, BLACKLIST,REGDATE,QUESTION,ANSWER FROM medi_member WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE medi_member SET PWD=#{name} WHERE PWD=#{pwd}
mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM `MEDI`.`medi_consulting_question` WHERE 1=1 AND DEL=0 AND MEM_SEQ=#{seq}
AND category LIKE CONCAT('%',#{s_keyword},'%')
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{s_keyword},'%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{s_keyword},'%')

SELECT h.SEQ,h.ID,h.PWD,h.NAME,h.TEL,h.POST,h.ADDRESS,h.LATITUDE,h.LONGTITUDE, h.EMAIL,h.QUESTION,h.ANSWER,h.CONFIRM_IMG,h.INFO,h.SCORE,h.DEL,h.REGDATE, a.ANS_SEQ,a.HOS_SEQ,a.WHOS_NAME,a.CONTENT,a.PARENT,a.ANS_DEL,a.ANS_WDATE FROM medi_hospital h INNER JOIN medi_consulting_answer a ON a.HOS_SEQ=h.SEQ WHERE a.PARENT=#{seq} AND a.ANS_DEL!=1 ORDER BY a.ANS_DEL DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE medi_consulting_question SET READCOUNT=READCOUNT+1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
